body_html:
I meet the same problem, and my ps server and worker server correct match with ps/worker index. but there also have this problem.

CreateSession still waiting for response from /job/ps/task/0

i check ps and worker python process. they all run in correct way.
any idea about this issue？ thanks

body:
I meet the same problem, and my ps server and worker server correct match with ps/worker index. but there also have this problem.  
```
CreateSession still waiting for response from /job/ps/task/0
```
i check ps and worker python process. they all run in correct way. 
any idea about this issue？ thanks
